sentences.english: Have you ever been treated for gingivitis or periodontitis?
sentences.chinese: 您針對牙齦炎或牙周炎治療過嗎？

sentences.english: Clinical observation on curative effect of compound areca gargle on dental plaque and gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 複方檳榔含漱液對控制菌斑和消除牙齦炎療效觀察。

sentences.english: In medical term, this is called pregnancy gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 在醫學上，這叫做妊娠性牙齦炎。

sentences.english: It is this stage that gingivitis is most notable.
sentences.chinese: 這是這個階段牙齦炎是最顯着的。

sentences.english: Elderly patients with diabetes are often accompanied by varying degrees of gingivitis and periodontitis .
sentences.chinese: 老年糖尿病患者往往伴有不同程度的牙齦炎和牙周炎。

sentences.english: Obijective To observe the effects of Compound tea polyphenols oral rinse in treatment of gingivitis in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察複方茶多酚含漱液對少兒牙齦炎的治療效果。

sentences.english: Scaling is one of the major methods for treating gingivitis and periodontitis.
sentences.chinese: 潔治是治療牙齦炎和牙周炎的主要手段之一。

sentences.english: Those who don’t floss regularly have much higher chances of developing an oral disease, such as gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 不經常使用牙線的人會更容易患上牙齦炎等口腔疾病。

sentences.english: Be aware of the causes and symptoms of gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 要注意的原因和牙齦炎的症狀。

sentences.english: This often includes inflammation of the gums, which is called pregnancy gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 常見有牙齦炎，稱之爲妊娠期齦炎。

sentences.english: Bacteria in plaque also cause gingivitis and other periodontal diseases.
sentences.chinese: 菌斑中的細菌還可以導致牙齦炎及其他牙周病。

sentences.english: The mildest form of gum disease is gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 牙周病的最溫和的形式是牙齦炎。

sentences.english: This is often the first sign of gingivitis and serious dental problems.
sentences.chinese: 這往往是第一個跡象牙齦炎和嚴重的牙齒有問題。

sentences.english: You can also have bad breath when you have gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以有口臭時，你有牙齦炎。

sentences.english: The two diseases are linked in that persistent gingivitis can lead to periodontitis.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種疾病的聯繫是，持續的牙齦炎將導致牙周炎。
